items.title: Bring Marshall’s Emberton II portable Bluetooth speaker anywhere for 30+ hours of playback at $95 (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Marshall Emberton II Portable Bluetooth Speaker at a Prime exclusive $94.99 shipped. While it sports a $170 MSRP, you’ll more regularly find it floating around $130 at full price since its newer third-generation model released, with discounts having gone as low as $95 over the year, which last popped up back during July’s Prime Day event. Last week’s Prime Big Deal Days event kept things at $100, but now you can score it back at the annual low for the second time ever. The deal gives you a 27% markdown off the going rate (44% off the MSRP), cutting $35 from the tag here, and saving you a total $75 off the MSRP that you would pay elsewhere, for another shot at the best price of 2025.

more…

items.title: Save up to 46% on Segway EVs for Prime Day, like the premium Max G3 smart e-scooter at $1,100 (Reg. $1,200), more
items.summary:
Update 10/13: Segway has extended its Fall Prime Day Sale through October 20 – so be sure to jump on these deals while they last so you can hop aboard your latest commuting solution with solid savings!

Segway has launched its Fall Prime Day Sale, with up to 46% discounts on a selection of its EVs directly from its website, as well as through Amazon. One notable price cut that’s been a long time coming is the Segway Max G3 Electric Scooter dropping to $1,099.99 shipped, with the price matched at Amazon too. It carries a $1,500 MSRP, though we’ve seen it keep down at $1,200 for the majority of the year since releasing in March, save for the $900 and $1,000 pre-sale and launch deals. Aside from those first-time discounts, you’re otherwise getting the best price since during this event, giving you $100 off the going rate for the third-best price we have tracked. Head below for more on this advanced cruiser and the other models benefiting from discounts.

more…

You’re getting another chance at this all-time low price again today, with $52 cut from the going rate. Head below for more on this unit and the others that are benefitting from discounts.
